Rules, stolen from Simenon and edited.
Spoiler:
-Mind the forum rules and guidelines.
-Votes must be in bold. If you do not bold your vote, it will not be counted.
-Lynching will require a simple majority of votes. Once a player has reached the necessary majority, any attempts to unvote will be unheeded. Feel free to post in twilight, though.
-You may not no-lynch.
-If a deadline is reached with no majority, the player with the most votes will be lynched. In the event of a tie, whoever has been up longer will be lynched.
-The game is not to be discussed outside the thread unless your role specifically states that you may do so.
-Once your death scene has been posted, you’re dead. You are allowed only a bah post.
-No small or invisible text. Don’t edit/delete previously submitted posts either.
-Don’t quote any PMs from me.
-I will prod at 48 hours and allow another 48 hours for a response before I seek a replacement.
-Please point out any mistakes I make in the thread. In particular, if I post a vote count that does not accurately reflect your vote, it is your responsibility to correct me. If you don’t your vote may be treated as it appears in the vote count.
-If you have any questions at all, please PM me or post the question in the thread.
-Remember, it’s a game and it’s supposed to be fun. Be nice to your fellow players and your mod. It would be hypocritical of me to be too strict here, but try to keep civil.
-Deadlines are set to two weeks. I may extend them at my discretion but don't count on it.
-Btw if you didn't notice the title this game is nightless.
